step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in the next repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands. Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your head as you bring your hands up.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
Holding steady! Remember to keep your head upright and avoid leaning forward.
Great job reversing the motion. Your elbows are getting closer together, which is good.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Keep focusing on keeping your elbows close to your head when you spread them wide. Remember to hold steady and avoid leaning forward.
